title: Death's dance now heals for ALL damage dealt
body:
But why? Why do you want Jax to be OP? Why do you want my boy to be banworthy? Why do you want Irelia to buy it? The limitation to physical damage is what balanced it.

***It's going to heal off of conq now***

At least nerf another stat to make up for it. At least reduce the % healed.  Omnivamp is so incredibly strong on champions that can use it. Now _every_ AD champ can use omnivamp.

I'm confused now... 

What was so toxic about having spell vamp on an item with AP?
They seem to have no qualms about adding it to both a hybrid item and an AD item...
{{champion:8}} this guys was the reason for it.
So was this guy {{champion:50}}

I think in season 4 morello explained it really well in a forum post,

if a champion like akali or veigar get's spellvamp as a viable option, then what happens is they nuke someone down for 1000 damage... and then insta-heal back for like 200 hit points.
Gaining an instant 200 hit points like that is bullshit. It's why summoner heal has a massive cooldown and applies this debuff that makes additional summoner heals only 50% effective before grievous wounds. It's why health potions, the most basic of consumables, applies it's heal over 15 seconds instead of instantly giving you the 150hp in one chunk.

The reason why lifesteal is okay is because it's paced healing, aka there is no surprise factor where they suddenly lurch up in health. With lifesteal, each hit is gonna restore a fixed amount and it's not going to deviate. (which btw, at the time, bloodthirster was king, to the point where they were stackeable and were first item rush worthy, so crit wasn't really a factor then).

That and mordekaiser and vlad get to negate the health costs to their abilities that riot specifically put in there to balance their lack of a mana bar.

There is a question of marginal advantage though. The vamp is nice, but typically what gets kata killed is getting cc locked and killed before she is able to jump to safety, and neither the vamp or damage delay helps in those circumstances. Deaths dance is not bad damage wise, but it's not so massively over advantaged that it beats out ap items if deathcap gets involved, and other ap items come with more useful defensive options. It's probably going to get picked up sometimes, but unlikely to replace her current core build path.
